description.displayText:
Allison C. is a gem!  
She was originally recommended to us by the director of the private school that my two kids attend.
She was with for us for over a year, and quickly became part of our family.
Her responsibilities included picking my kids up from school, taking them to their after school activities, and homework help.  She was amazing at helping both kids study for their tests, and even organized my middle school daughter with her test and project schedules.
Both my kids' grades and test taking skills improved during the time Allison was with us.
Above and beyond her responsibilities, she baked with my daughter, and even was a stand-in dance-mom when I was unable to attend one of my daughter's dance competitions.
Allison is always on time, always cheerful and good-natured, and very reliable. 
I feel very confident in recommending her - any family would be lucky to have her!

description.displayText: Allison babysit our daughter for us and I can highly recommend her. She is honest, trustworthy and very responsible. Also, my daughter LOVES her! She is fun and loving and has a great attitude. I trust her 100% with my daughter and in my home.
